title: "I won't waste my gold Just to prevent mundo from healing" my Tristana
body:
800 FUCKING GOLD, CAN YOU ALREADY BUILD IT SO THEIR MUNDO ISN'T UNKILLABLE?

this is what is wrong right now, riot gave to the ADC a bunch of items made to deal with everyone, and the ADC CONTINUE to rush IE+PD. 

"{{item:3153}}  was nerfed, so it must be useless now against a 5k hp tank" said none ever, we wonder why mundo has 57% win rate.

http://weknowmemes.com/generator/uploads/generated/g1334963354255228181.jpg

replies.body: I, as a Mundo player, thank you all for thinking that {{item:3153}} is garbage now. Please don't start building it again.

>Please don't start building it again.

{{champion:67}} Not
{{champion:110}} A
{{champion:96}} Problem.
but one of them are shiet, I let you figure that one out.

Koggles is out of meta. I'm not convinced he's that bad, but games are lost before he hits his power spikes.
Vayne is having a similar issue of surviving past lane phase. But she was overall buffed.
Varus is flat worse than Jinx at this point.

. . . So. . .
Varus?
just rush rageblade on kogmaw and become one of its many abusers as you melt the entire enemy team

Yes, rush that completely worthless item. It serves no purpose on ranged champs. On melee, sure. Stacking it is easy. On Kog? You want to waste 2-4s of standing completely still before you can even use it to its fullest, goooooo for it. I'll just grab a Thornmail and watch you die before you finish getting all the stacks.
Wait, you think Kog is NOT supposed to stand completely still attacking? Wow no wonder nobody wins as Kog'maw these days.
You need to stay still to maximize DPS, but if you get people in your face, you kinda have to move and moving means your stacks on Rageblade quickly poof.
The stacks last 5 seconds. It's more than enough to reposition and start attacking again.

{{champion:32}} destroys tanks by crying
{{champion:150}} shu shu bana
{{champion:75}} lot of health? = damage
{{champion:78}} Q for days
{{champion:254}} similar to vayne
XD. Yep, when will ADCs in low elo learn XD.
You are silver 4..... That is low elo

i know, which is sad. I see people who are worse than me, and in the same low range XD. Even amongst slightly higher elo, i see super newbs. And i am bad, but there are people who are bigger trash than me XD.

You should be proud of yourself!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Yep, Im proud at not being the biggest newb on the block XD.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

One day, I shall reach your level of not god-awful noobiness.

One day in the fateful future
Start by buying a pink ward, and like that you are not the biggest newb anymore ^_^
But mah extra longsword, I need the damages man
Who needs em eh XD. The  Pinks theys OP mans.
Ik, jks. I get them whenever I buy a major or minor purchase
That Tristana was a dumbass.
And this is why executioners calling was removed.  People go full retard. Its not like she even needed to focus Mundo.  Just make sure to hit him every so often...

> [{quoted}](name=warpenguin555,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XoIppkwZ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-17T17:04:07.406+0000)
>
> And this is why executioners calling was removed.  People go full retard. Its not like she even needed to focus Mundo.  **Just make sure to hit him every so often...**

yep that's why they increased the duration to 3 sec, beside YOU're forced to focus mundo, if you don't he will kill you.

why was it removed? because it was useless, it had no upgrade in late game and was barrely cost efficient. Now it costs 800 gold, gives 15 AD you can just purchase it and upgrade it in late game.

> [{quoted}](name=ZeusHasRefresher,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XoIppkwZ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-11-17T17:11:19.947+0000)
>
> yep that's why they increased the duration to 3 sec, beside YOU're forced to focus mundo, if you don't he will kill you.
> 
> why was it removed? because it was useless, it had no upgrade in late game and was barrely cost efficient. Now it costs 800 gold, gives 15 AD you can just purchase it and upgrade it in late game.

Back in the day when I said build executioners calling against Mundo my team would always reply by saying "just ignite him". That's another reason why this item is never used. Ignite already solves half the problem.
iginte has a cool down {{item:3123}} does not

> [{quoted}](name=Pyrokineticmage,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XoIppkwZ,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2015-11-17T18:34:33.354+0000)
>
> Back in the day when I said build executioners calling against Mundo my team would always reply by saying "just ignite him". That's another reason why this item is never used. Ignite already solves half the problem.

yea, that's why we lost, we had 0 ignite ignite,  some people continue to take tp even if mundo is in the enemy team
{{champion:133}} I never take TP anymore.
Tp/quinn ult with homeguard goes faster than fucking rammus I swear.
Mundo go where he pleases.  Did you forget that?
I am slowly reaching the point where I am considering purchasing Executioner's Calling on tank junglers and supports just so someone on our team has it.
I bought {{item:3123}} first item with Miss Fortune for Nostalgia.

> [{quoted}](name=Ravenhale,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XoIppkwZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-17T17:31:03.449+0000)
>
> I bought {{item:3123}} first item with Miss Fortune for Nostalgia.

good, it's op against mundo and swain

> [{quoted}](name=ZeusHasRefresher,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XoIppkwZ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-11-17T17:46:14.620+0000)
>
> good, it's op against mundo and swain

I was in an enemy Soraka lane. It didn't feel like a bad buy at all.

Grievous Wounds only affects self-healing now, actually.

While you would reduce the health Soraka restores using her Q, you wouldn't actually reduce any healing she performs on her allies.

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XoIppkwZ,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-17T17:56:19.292+0000)
>
> Grievous Wounds only affects self-healing now, actually.
> 
> While you would reduce the health Soraka restores using her Q, you wouldn't actually reduce any healing she performs on her allies.

and soraka ultying herself

IIRC, her ultimate still removes Grievous Wounds.

Though I can't remember if it removes GW before or after applying the heal.
Removes any debuff and then heals

I had to buy executioner's calling playing as Hecarim once because of the same exact issue....I was 9/3/7 and my Jinx was 0/3/4, not like she was contributing much in the first place. 

Mundo isn't overpowered, its just he counters ADC stupidity pretty damn hard. Which unfortunately is what this preseason is all about. 

Hurrr durrr Crit! Fuck BORK!!! Fuck GW!!! MOAR CRIT! MOAR CRIT! MOAR CRIT!

*Facepalm*

I would say it's less Mundo countering ADCs and more a combination of:

* ADCs refusing to buy Mortal Reminder or Lord Dominik's Regards (so no armor penetration)
* The frequency of AD heavy teams as every player insists on trying the new items letting Mundo stack nothing but health and armor.

I watched a mundo buy sunfires so he didn't have to use his w, then get visage, merc, waramorgs, randuins and a GA...

He went 11/0 with 200 farm by 20 minutes and our adc jinx thought he was cheating when he dominated her, she went full crit and refused to listen to us.

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XoIppkwZ,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-11-17T18:00:42.548+0000)
>
> I would say it's less Mundo countering ADCs and more a combination of:
> 
> * ADCs refusing to buy Mortal Reminder or Lord Dominik's Regards (so no armor penetration)
> * The frequency of AD heavy teams as every player insists on trying the new items letting Mundo stack nothing but health and armor.

I've had a 100% win rate as {{champion:24}} and{{champion:54}} so far. Feels good. Hex tech gun blade is definitely worth being a recommended/essential item on Jax now.
Pretty much, get rageblade and hextech and you are done snowballing... then go full tank

>
> Pretty much, get rageblade and hextech and you are done snowballing... then go full tank

pfft, fuck dat, damage is your tank now. {{item:3047}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3065}}
Tell that to rammus

>

I like to build adc items on rammus .-.
And I thought ADC mains are only stupid enough to not want to upgrade their trinkets, less even use it.

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XoIppkwZ,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-11-17T17:56:05.998+0000)
>
> And I thought ADC mains are only stupid enough to not want to upgrade their trinkets, less even use it.

na, must have 100% crit.

{{champion:15}}  {{item:3031}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3078}} 

Am I doing it right?

Just figured out this 100% crit build for her.

{{champion:15}} with:{{item:3508}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3087}} Would net you 100% crit AND % max mana regen on each crit... Wait... WHY AM I NOT TRYING THIS OUT ON THE MARKSWOMEN QUEEN OF WAVE CLEAR?! O_o

Because crit is wasted on her.
She can't control who PD marks.
And it lacks raw AD.
